name: Loopfactory
description:
In this game you take a role of an unfortunate scientist who is trying to get out of a Time Loop by building factories and utilising the only shapes that can travel through time - Hexagons.

Please read small ingame tutorial in order to understand how to play. Juat in case I will duplicate it here:

For your first Factory chain Buy Circles Factory and HexFactory.

You can move Factories by dragging them by the orange button and connect them by clicking on them. Previously clicked Factory will connect to the clicked one. Make sure that factories match. For example, it is only possible to connect Factory that requires squares to the Factory that produces them.

Press Play button to start. Press Speed button while Factories are working to change speed
